Description: Deploy ASA in a VPC infrastructure.

Label.default: DMZ Interface Settings (only supported for 4Xlarge instances)

AvailabilityZone.Description: The availability zone in which to deploy the stack. If using existing VPC should be the same Outside VPC Subnet deployed to.

VpcId.Description: Optional - VPC Id of existing VPC. Leave blank to have a new VPC created

VpcCidr.Description: The CIDR block for a new VPC

IgwId.Description: Optional - Id of existing Internet Gateway Attached to VPC. Required if setting VpcId

MgmtSubnetId.Description: Optional - existing Mgmt VPC Subnet Id. Leave blank to have a new Mgmt Subnet created

MgmtSubnetCidr.Description: The management subnet of the security gateway

MgmtIp.Description: Optionally provide an IP for the management interface

InsideSubnetId.Description: Optional - existing Inside VPC Subnet Id. Leave blank to have a new Inside Subnet created

InsideSubnetCidr.Description: The inside subnet of the security gateway

InsideIp.Description: Optionally provide an IP for the inside interface

OutsideSubnetId.Description: Optional - existing Outside VPC Subnet Id. Required if setting VpcId

OutsideSubnetCidr.Description: The outside subnet of the security gateway

OutsideIp.Description: Optionally provide an IP for the outside interface

DmzSubnetId.Description: Optional - existing DMZ VPC Subnet Id. Required if setting VpcId

DmzSubnetCidr.Description: The DMZ subnet of the security gateway

DmzIp.Description: Optionally provide an IP for the DMZ interface

AddDMZInterface.Description: Whether or not to add a DMZ interface to ASA

KeyName.Description: The EC2 Key Pair to allow SSH access to ASA

MgmtExternalAccessCidr.Description: CAUTION: by default, the management port is accessed from any public IP addresses, Please restrict it to access it only from the specific IP address

Properties.GroupDescription: Allow only traffic from MgmtExternalAccessCidr IP Ranges

Properties.Description: Interface for management traffic of ASA

ASALicType.Description: License Type of ASAv Instance created

ASAAddress.Description: The external address of ASAv instance
